shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the audio device state changes.

p.codeblock: public virtual void OnAudioDeviceStateChanged(string deviceId, MEDIA_DEVICE_TYPE deviceType, MEDIA_DEVICE_STATE_TYPE deviceState) { }
final void Function(String deviceId, MediaDeviceType deviceType, MediaDeviceStateType deviceState)? onAudioDeviceStateChanged;

section.p: This callback notifies the application that the system's audio device state is changed. For example, a headset is unplugged from the device.
section.note: This method is for Windows and macOS only.
